user_input:
Modify the DHEM model. 
  o	Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level (use crud pipeline)
  o	Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
  o	Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited. Add the filename property with the name of the datafile just created.
  o	Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
  o	Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step. Use the crud pipeline
  o	Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the PLEXOS model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the appropriate datafile attribute from the available options.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file by setting all non-zero values to 999 and copying the H2\Gas version.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the correct data file for modification.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren't 0 to 999 and copy the H2\Gas version

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class under the Gas Pipeline category, naming it to reflect PCIPMI capacities Unlimited.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', choose the appropriate category and object naming convention.

tasks.description: Update the newly created datafile object by adding the filename property with the name of the datafile just created.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', determine the correct property update for the new datafile object.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the appropriate context to create the new scenario.

tasks.description: Update each object in the H2 interconnection category in the gas pipeline class by adding a max flow property linked to the created datafile and scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the objects in the H2 interconnection category and update their properties.

tasks.description: Update each object in the H2 Internal bottleneck category in the gas pipeline class by adding a max flow property linked to the created datafile and scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the objects in the H2 Internal bottleneck category for property update.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' to create 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline' and add the new scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', choose the appropriate model for cloning and attach the new scenario.
